img_above_text:
Licorice (x5) - 120 Will | Aged Ginseng (x5) - 90 Will | Fragrant Jade Flower (x5) - 120 Will | Purple Lingzhi (x5) - 90 Will
Fire Bellflower (x5) - 120 Will | Jade Lotus (x5) - 90 Will | |
img_below_text:
In addition, you’ll also have access to crafting a new set of armor since defeating the Black Wind King: The Ebongold Set, which provides better defense and a few bonuses to using your Cloud Step. Also, with the Flame Ebongold from the boss himself, you can use it and other ingredients to craft the Wind Bear Staff!
![Wukong Sandgate 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c9/Wukong_Sandgate_11.jpg)

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image showcases the crafting menu for the "Wind Bear Staff," a rare weapon in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The staff has an attack stat of 50 and a critical hit chance of 4%, with a unique effect that significantly boosts the critical hit chance of the "Unveiling Strike of Cloud Step." Crafting the weapon requires specific materials: 1 Flame Ebongold, 4 Yaoguai Cores, and 8 Stone Spirits, along with sufficient Will currency. The preceding and following text highlights the availability of new crafting options after defeating the Black Wind King, including the Ebongold armor set and this weapon. The staff is crafted at Keeper's Shrines or blacksmiths.
